txt.en:
'Since we have started watching the Gorge, the number of trolls down there has continued to increase.

'Thus far, you and your friends are the only ones who have had the strength and wits to fight them head on.

'Until we get more men from Edoras, we have not the force to drive them out, but if you can take a few of those beasts down, it should serve to keep them at bay for a while and ensure the safety of Stangard.'
'I could see a bit of your battles from up here....quite astounding!\n\n'Your valour continues to amaze me, [placeholder]. You have my gratitude and that of the Men of Stangard.'
Captain Agelbrit fears that the trolls of the Limight Gorge may gather their strength to attack Stangard.
Defeat trolls in the Limlight Gorge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat trolls in the Limlight Gorge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should gather your allies and defeat the monstrous trolls that inhabit the Limlight Gorge to prevent them from mustering numbers that might threaten Stangard.
Captain Agelbrit is at the Limlight Gorge guard-post.\n\nYou should return to Captain Agelbrit with news of your success.
